inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getDedicatedIpPool.

poolName.description: Name of the dedicated IP pool.

tags.description: A map of tags attached to the pool.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getDedicatedIpPool.

arn.description: ARN of the Dedicated IP Pool.

dedicatedIps.description: A list of objects describing the pool's dedicated IP's. See `dedicated_ips`.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

scalingMode.description: (Optional) IP pool scaling mode. Valid values: `STANDARD`, `MANAGED`.

tags.description: A map of tags attached to the pool.
